points.content: Hands on software development: being assign specific tasks that can be developed and produced within a designated time interval.

Collaborated on an agile-based team for requirement analysis and testing of an iPad OS application, as well as programming, designing, and deploying an iPad application using Swift, XCode, Interface Builder, Cocoa Touch, and other iOS development tools.
Programed, designed, and tested an application using Swift, XCode, Interface Builder, Cocoa Touch, and other iOS development tools.
Distributed an iPad OS application to the App Store.

Collaborated and communicated on a small, multi-disciplinary agile team of web developers and designers to create modern, performant, maintainable systems for non-profits, churches and other ministries.

Worked with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems throughout the entire development stack, such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Next JS, React, Strapi, Node JS, and Azure

Tasked with leading several website development projects; scoping, planning, and managing the technical architecture for fulfilling web services, as well as managing a team of web developers and designers to fulfill responsibilities around the development stack.
